welcome_benefits: Silver Elite Status in the Marriott Bonvoy Program and One Free Night Award Worth 15,000 Marriott Bonvoy Points

Movie & Dining: Accelerated 4 RPs on Dining, and Entertainment
Rewards Rate: 8 Marriott Bonvoy Points/₹150 for Spends at Marriott Hotels, 4 Marriott Bonvoy Points/₹150 for Travel, Dining, and Entertainment, and 2 Marriott Bonvoy Points/₹150 for Other Spends
Reward Redemption: Marriott Bonvoy points are credited to your membership account and you can redeem them for discounted hotel stays, dining offers, etc. at participating Marriott Hotels
Travel: Get up to 4 Free Night Awards at Marriott Bonvoy hotels
Domestic Lounge Access: 12 Complimentary Lounge Access at Both Domestic and International Terminals
Golf: 2 Complimentary Golf Course Access and 2 Lessons Per Quarter
Insurance Benefits: Air Accident Cover, Travel Insurance, and Credit Shield

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 400 to Rs. 5000

product_details: 1 Free Night Award as a welcome benefit, valid for 1 year at participating Marriott hotels.
Complimentary Marriott Bonvoy Silver Elite status.
8 Marriott Bonvoy Points on spends at participating Marriott hotels, 4 Marriott Bonvoy Points on travel, entertainment, and dining spends, and 2 Marriott Bonvoy Points on all other spends.
Up to 3 bonus free night awards on reaching the target spend milestone.
12 Complimentary domestic and international lounge access.
2 Complimentary golf course access and golf lessons per quarter worldwide.
Air accident cover, credit shield, loss liability cover, and other insurance benefits.
